title.narrative: S3MR Sustainable Management of Madagascar's Marine Resources

description.narrative:
Program Component 1. Marine Protected Area (MPA) / Locally Managed Marine Area (LMMA) expansion and MPA and priority fisheries management plans implemented in key areas
1.a Ministry of Environment, Ecology, Oceans and Forests (MEEMF) Marine Protected Ar,1.b Ministry of Marine Resources and Fisheries (MRHP) SWIOFish2 (Fisheries co-management units fisheries Management plans),Program Component 2. Improved biodiversity and priority fisheries governance 2.a Ministry of Environment, Ecology, Oceans and Forests (MEEMF) MPA project ,2.b Ministry of Marine Resources and Fisheries (MRHP) SWIOFish2 (fisheries regalian functions apart from management plan and co-management implementation)
,Program Component 3. Increased economic and social benefits from priority fisheries and other economic developments 3.a Ministry of Environment, Ecology, Oceans and Forests MEEMF Marine Protected Area project
,3.b Ministry of Marine Resources and Fisheries (MRHP) SWIOFish2 (for fisheries sustainable development and restriction of access compensation due to fisheries management plans)
,Program Component 4. Enhanced regional integration 4.a Ministry of Environment, Ecology, Oceans and Forests MEEMF Marine Protected Area project
,program management cost

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Environment, Ecology, Oceans and Forests; Ministry of Living Marine Resources and Fisheries; WCS; Blue Ventures
